name: Grand Theft Auto IV
description:
Includes xlive patch to circumvent GFWL.
Uses D9VK (Direct3D9 to Vulkan) by Joshua Ashton.
notes:
Online play is disabled due to xlive patch.
**CONFIGURE AND INSTALL THE DEPENDENCIES FIRST**
Instructions for Vulkan drivers (for D9VK support): https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Installing-drivers
content:
files:
- xlive: https://github.com/AccountOneOff/lutris_files/raw/master/xlive.dll
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.12/d9vk-0.12.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 12210
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
    file: d9vk
- move:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.12/
    src: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/GTAIV
    src: $xlive
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: GrabFullScreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.12
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
